name: ColorsQuest
description:
Hello,

I have been working on a small game for 2 weeks and I propose it here to get feedback and ideas.

I would like to know if the game is worth continuing because it would take more than 6 months to finish it.

pitch:

you are a pencil in a tiny black and white world, your goal is to complete all the levels (platformer) to unlock the colors one by one.
